mapper.select: SELECT board_num, cust_id, title, category, content, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as regdate FROM board ORDER BY board_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_num, cust_id, title, category, content, regdate) VALUES(board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cust_id}, #{title}, #{category}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
